RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Results from query to NASA/IPAC Extragalactic Database (NED), which is operated by the Jet Propulsion Laboratory, California Institute of Technology, under contract with the National Aeronautics and Space Administration. This work was (partially) supported by the US National Virtual Observatory development project, which is funded by the National Science Foundation under cooperative agreement AST0122449 with The Johns Hopkins University.

FIELD.name: No.
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A sequential data-point number applicable to this list only.

FIELD.name: Frequency Targeted
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The frequency or wavelength at which the data apply (in common astronomical jargon, e.g. "V" for the Johnson Vband, "IRAS 12 microns" for the IRAS 12 micron band, etc.)

FIELD.name: Published Velocity
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The radial velocity , derived from derived from the shift of some spectral feature, in km/sec

FIELD.name: Published Velocity Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The velocity error, if given in the original reference.

FIELD.name: Published Redshift
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The redshift or velocity as published in dimensionless units z = [deltalambda]/lambda

FIELD.name: Published Redshift Uncertainty
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The redshift or velocity error, as published in dimensionless units z.

FIELD.name: Refcode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The NED 19-digit Bibliographic Reference code.

FIELD.name: Name in publication
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The object's name in NED's standard format, of the object to which the data apply.

FIELD.name: Published RA
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The object's published coordinate RA

FIELD.name: Published Dec
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The object's published coordinate DEC.

FIELD.name: Published Equinox
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The object's published equinox.

FIELD.name: Unc. Significance
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of uncertainty reported in the original publication; e.g. "rms uncertainty","90percent confidence","no unc. reported", etc.

FIELD.name: Spectral Range
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The observed spectral range. Possible values are: Gamma, ray X-ray,Ultraviolet, Optical,Near IR, Infrared,Far IR, Sub-millimeter,Millimeter, Radio.

FIELD.name: Spectrograph
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The observing instrumentation, e.g. "Long-slit spectrum", "Heterodyne receiver (e.g. 21-cm)", "Grism" etc.

FIELD.name: Measurement Mode Features
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The number and nature of the spectral features measured. For multiple objects (e.g. galaxy clusters), the number of objects measured.

FIELD.name: Measurement Mode Technique
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The method of measuring the spectrum, e.g. "Cross- correlation fit to template spectrum", "Mid-point of line profile at 20 percent level","Peak of line", etc.

FIELD.name: Spatial Mode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The part of the object measured, e.g. "Systemic redshift," "Average over multiple objects," "Redshift is for individual star," etc.

FIELD.name: Epoch
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The epoch of observation, if given.

FIELD.name: Reference Frame
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the nature of the redshift or velocity and any corrections applied to it,e.g. "Heliocentric," "Corrected to the 3K microwave background," etc.

FIELD.name: Apex
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The velocity and direction of the apex of the reference frame used to calculate the published redshift, if given. If not, NED calculates the heliocentric redshift using the apex as published.

FIELD.name: Longitude of the Apex
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The longitude of the apex of the reference frame used to calculate the published redshift, if given. If not, NED calculates the heliocentric redshift using the apex as published.

FIELD.name: Latitude of the Apex
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The latitude of the apex of the reference frame used to calculate the published redshift, if given. If not, NED calculates the heliocentric redshift using the apex as published.

FIELD.name: Apex Coordinate System
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The coordinate system used for expressing of the apex of the reference frame.

FIELD.name: Qualifiers
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Self-explanatory notes pertaining to the history of the data or adjustments to the data or changes introduced by NED or values modified by NED.

FIELD.name: Comments
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Other information about the data.

TR.TD: From new, raw data; OBJ_NAME modified from published data
